name: Without A Paddle (NateDoggGames)
description:
PLAY ONLINE VERSION HERE (EXACT SAME AS DOWNLOAD):
https://natedogggames.itch.io/without-a-paddle-online-version

Game for GMTK jam 2020,

The raft has lost all control! You need to guide it to safety, but you can't steer it? Instead you'll have to draw lines to guide it down the river until you reach the safety of the finish line. 
Use the mouse to draw, press escape for menu.

See how many levels you can complete! The river gets faster, and the obstacles increase. There is unlimited levels.

I made this in about 12 hrs because I had other things on this weekend, but I think its still a fun little game, might port an improved version to android. 

Good luck, and thanks for playing!!

P.S.    - whirlpools actually help you....
